title: 玩家默认的生命值如何调

replies.author: kkk154
replies.txt_content: 如果你加了ils可以在配置文件的baseHealth那里调

replies.author: junge128
replies.txt_content: 请问插件全名是？是        GuoItemLoreCommand吗？
